section: Principle Two - Willpower Is A Scam

scenes.text: We have to go to a laboratory.
scenes.prompt: A laboratory setting with beakers, equipment, and scientific instruments. An arrow points toward the entrance. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Large bold text showing 'WHY?' with a question mark. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A scientist in white lab coat with glasses standing in a laboratory. A nameplate reads 'ROY BAUMEISTER'. He holds a clipboard with a thoughtful expression. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
The scientist in white lab coat now shown with psychology symbols around him: a brain diagram, inkblot test, couch. His credentials are established. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Close-up of a plate piled high with fresh-baked chocolate chip cookies. Steam rises from them indicating warmth. The cookies look delicious. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

The same plate of chocolate chip cookies with wavy aroma lines rising from them. A small oven in the background shows they just came out. The appeal is emphasized. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Baumeister brought people into his lab.
scenes.prompt: Multiple standing cartoon people walking through a laboratory door. The scientist in white lab coat welcomes them inside. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: He put those warm, delicious cookies right in front of them.
scenes.prompt: Standing cartoon people seated at a table with the plate of chocolate chip cookies directly in front of them. One group wears red shirts, the other wears blue shirts. The cookies are prominently displayed and tempting. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Half of them were told not to eat them.
scenes.prompt: Standing cartoon people wearing red shirts at the table looking longingly at the plate of chocolate chip cookies. A sign shows 'DO NOT EAT'. Their expressions show struggle. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Close-up of hands with red sleeves hovering near the plate of chocolate chip cookies but not touching. The hands tremble with restraint. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Just sit there and smell them.
scenes.prompt: Standing cartoon person wearing a red shirt sitting rigidly at the table, nostrils flaring, inhaling the aroma from the plate of chocolate chip cookies. Their face shows torture and temptation. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A different group of standing cartoon people wearing blue shirts at another table, looking relaxed. A question mark floats above them. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Standing cartoon people wearing blue shirts happily eating from a plate of chocolate chip cookies. Their expressions show joy and freedom. No rules apply. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Standing cartoon person wearing a blue shirt stuffing chocolate chip cookies into their mouth with both hands. Cookie crumbs fly. Pure indulgence. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: After a while, both groups were given puzzles to solve.
scenes.prompt: Both groups of standing cartoon people now sitting at desks with complex puzzle papers in front of them. One group wears red shirts, the other wears blue shirts. The scene shifts to a testing environment. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Close-up of a puzzle page showing an incredibly complex maze with no clear solution. The difficulty is overwhelming. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: The kind designed to make you quit.
scenes.prompt: Standing cartoon person at a desk, head in hands, surrounded by crumpled puzzle papers. The puzzles are meant to frustrate. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Now you're thinking: the people who resisted cookies had more willpower, so they did better on the puzzles.
scenes.prompt: Standing cartoon person with a thought bubble showing cookie resisters wearing red shirts winning at puzzles. The assumption is illustrated. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Large bold text showing 'RIGHT?' with a question mark. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Large bold text showing 'WRONG' with a large X beside it. The answer is definitive. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: The cookie resisters gave up 50% faster.
scenes.prompt: Split scene. Left side: cookie resisters wearing red shirts at desks giving up quickly, heads down, pushing puzzles away, timer showing short time. Right side: cookie eaters wearing blue shirts still working, engaged, timer showing longer time. A '50% FASTER' label points to the left side. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Standing cartoon person with hands up, confused expression, eyebrows raised. Their reaction shows disbelief at the results. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: The people with MORE willpower actually had LESS persistence.
scenes.prompt: A balance scale showing 'MORE WILLPOWER' on one side tipping down, and 'LESS PERSISTENCE' on the other side going up. The paradox is illustrated. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Standing cartoon person scratching their head with a completely baffled expression. Squiggly confusion lines surround their head. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A lightbulb illuminating above the confused expression. Understanding begins to dawn. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Standing cartoon person leaning forward with one finger raised, ready to explain. Their expression shows clarity. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

A semicircular fuel gauge labeled 'WILLPOWER' at the top, with three colored segments from left to right: red (empty), yellow (middle), green (full). A gray needle points all the way to the right at 'F'. The gauge has 'E' on the left and 'F' on the right. Simple cartoon style with clean lines on black background.

A semicircular fuel gauge labeled 'WILLPOWER' at the top, with three colored segments from left to right: red (empty), yellow (middle), green (full). A gray needle points to the middle of the green segment. The gauge has 'E' on the left and 'F' on the right. A small car icon appears below the gauge. Simple cartoon style with clean lines on black background.

scenes.text: Every decision you make drains it.
scenes.prompt: A semicircular fuel gauge labeled 'WILLPOWER' at the top, with three colored segments from left to right: red (empty), yellow (middle), green (full). A gray needle points to the border between green and yellow. Green liquid spills from a crack in the bottom of the gauge, splashing downward. The word 'DECISION' appears below with a downward arrow. Simple cartoon style with clean lines on black background.

scenes.text: Every distraction you fight drains it.
scenes.prompt: A semicircular fuel gauge labeled 'WILLPOWER' at the top, with three colored segments from left to right: red (empty), yellow (middle), green (full). A gray needle points to the middle of the yellow segment. Yellow liquid gushes from a larger crack in the bottom of the gauge, pouring out in a heavy stream. The word 'DISTRACTION' appears below with a downward arrow. Simple cartoon style with clean lines on black background.

scenes.text: Every cookie you resist drains it.
scenes.prompt: A semicircular fuel gauge labeled 'WILLPOWER' at the top, with three colored segments from left to right: red (empty), yellow (middle), green (full). A gray needle points to the border between yellow and red. Red liquid floods out from the bottom of the gauge, splashing everywhere in a dramatic spill. A chocolate chip cookie icon appears below with a downward arrow. Simple cartoon style with clean lines on black background.

scenes.text: By evening, the tank is empty.
scenes.prompt: A semicircular fuel gauge labeled 'WILLPOWER' at the top, with three colored segments from left to right: red (empty), yellow (middle), green (full). A gray needle points all the way to the left at 'E'. The last drops fall from the cracked bottom into a large puddle of spilled liquid below the gauge. A crescent moon and 'Zzz' float in the top right corner. Simple cartoon style with clean lines on black background.
The word 'WEAKNESS' cracking apart and shattering like glass, fragments falling away. The explanation breaks down. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A DNA helix or biological cell diagram with the word 'BIOLOGY' beside it. The cause is scientific, not personal. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Judges deny parole more often in the afternoon than in the morning.
scenes.prompt: Split scene on black background. Left side: a cartoon judge with white curly wig, black robe with white collar at a bench stamping 'APPROVED' on papers, a yellow sun icon in the top left corner. Right side: the same cartoon judge with white curly wig, black robe with white collar at a bench stamping 'DENIED' on papers, a white crescent moon icon in the top right corner. Simple cartoon style with clean white lines.
Two identical case folders side by side. They contain the same information. The comparison is clear. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

Two identical documents side by side on black background. Each document shows the same three bullet points with horizontal lines representing text. An equals sign '=' floats between them. Simple cartoon style with clean lines on black background.
Two clocks side by side. One shows morning, one shows afternoon. This is the only variable. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

A cartoon judge with white curly wig, black robe with white collar at a bench. Above their head floats a semicircular fuel gauge labeled 'MENTAL FUEL' at the top, with three colored segments from left to right: red (empty), yellow (middle), green (full). A gray needle points to the red segment near 'E'. A clock showing afternoon time appears beside the gauge. Simple cartoon style with clean white lines on black background.

A cartoon judge with white curly wig, black robe with white collar with a dunce cap drawn over their image and a question mark. The provocative question is posed. Simple cartoon style with clean white lines on black background.
Large bold text showing 'NO' with a checkmark. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

A cartoon judge with white curly wig, black robe with white collar at a bench looking tired but normal. The word 'HUMAN' floats beside them. They are not to blame. Simple cartoon style with clean white lines on black background.
Standing cartoon person pointing at themselves with an understanding expression. They are human too. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: We keep trying to solve a biological problem with motivational solutions.
scenes.prompt: Split scene on black background. Left side: a semicircular fuel gauge labeled 'WILLPOWER' with three colored segments (red, yellow, green), gray needle pointing to red near 'E', with a label 'BIOLOGICAL PROBLEM' below it. Right side: three rectangular motivational posters stacked vertically showing 'YOU CAN DO IT', 'BELIEVE', and 'TRY HARDER', with a label 'MOTIVATIONAL SOLUTIONS' below them. A large 'â‰ ' (not equals sign) floats between the two sides. Simple cartoon style with clean white lines.
A speech bubble containing 'Just have more willpower' being crumpled up by a hand and tossed away. The bad advice is discarded like trash. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Standing cartoon person stretching upward trying to be taller. An arrow points up with 'JUST BE TALLER' label. The absurdity is clear. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Large bold text showing 'DOESN'T WORK' with a large X. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: So if willpower doesn't work, what does?
scenes.prompt: Standing cartoon person with hands open in a questioning gesture. The word 'WILLPOWER' is crossed out. A question mark glows where the answer should be. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: We have to go to a running track.
scenes.prompt: A running track with painted lanes stretching into the distance. An arrow points toward it. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
Large bold text showing 'WHY?' with a question mark. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
A muscular runner in athletic wear standing on the running track in a confident pose. A nameplate shows 'NOAH LYLES'. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
The same muscular runner in athletic wear with the letters 'ADHD' floating beside him. His expression shows focus despite the condition. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
